page.title: 17Bright Steels (continued)
page.content:
The company tries to be as self-sufficient as possible. It operates its own transport, Bright Steels Transport Ltd., which owns a fleet of lorries that carry loads of steel in and out of the works and delivers its products throughout the Unithed Kingdom, principally to stock-holders who are able to cater for users' individual requirements.
The bulk of the company's production is in the mild steel range, but other qualities produced include American, German and Swedish standards as well as British. Close quality control enables the firm to compete successfully in these export markets.
Recent expansion has enabled Bright Steels to draw flats up to ten inches wide and four inches thick.
